items.name: Data Interaction Group (DIG)
items.description: DIG integrates machine learning and human-computer interaction to enable more intuitive data analysis tools.

items.name: Human-Centered Data Lab
items.description: This lab works with educational data to improve learning outcomes using AI-driven analysis and cognitive modeling.

items.name: Kittur Lab
items.description: This lab combines human and machine intelligence to help users process large volumes of information more efficiently.

items.name: eHeart Lab
items.description: Researches how interaction technologies and storytelling platforms can enhance personal expression and social connections.

items.name: Natural Programming Lab
items.description: Focuses on human-centered design of programming languages and tools, making them easier for humans to understand and use.

items.name: Community-Centered AI for Public Housing
items.description: Researchers use comics to explain how AI supports public housing systems, making AI accessible to marginalized communities.

items.name: Interactive Structures Lab
items.description: Focuses on computational tools that help novice users create interactive, functional structures with AI-supported digital fabrication.
